actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend Title II of the Social Security Act as to modify the criteria respecting certain self-employment income for purposes of the Social Security Retirement Test.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to disregard, for the purposes of determining OASDI benefits based on income: (1) renewal commissions received by an insurance salesman from life insurance policies which such salesman sold before reaching age 65; and (2) self-employment income received from the sale of certain agricultural or horticultural commodities.

titles.title: A bill to amend Title II of the Social Security Act as to modify the criteria respecting certain self-employment income for purposes of the Social Security Retirement Test.
